verses.verse: On that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and therein was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%>, that the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> and the <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> should not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>;

Because they <S%H6923>met<s%> not the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%>, but <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> against them, that he should <S%H7043>curse<s%> them: howbeit our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>.
Now it came to pass, when they had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%>, that they <S%H914>separated<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the mixed <S%H6154>multitude<s%>.

¶ And <S%H6440>before<s%> this, <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, having the <S%H5414>oversight<s%> of the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, was <S%H7138>allied<s%> unto <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>:

And he had <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3957>chamber<s%>, where <S%H6440>aforetime<s%> they <S%H5414>laid<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offerings<s%>, the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of the <S%H1715>corn<s%>, the new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, which was <S%H4687>commanded<s%> to be given to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, and the <S%H7778>porters<s%>; and the <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>.

But in all this time was not I at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: for in the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> I unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H7093>after<s%> certain <S%H3117>days<s%> obtained I <S%H7592>leave<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>:

And I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H995>understood<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, in <S%H6213>preparing<s%> him a <S%H5393>chamber<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And it <S%H3415>grieved<s%> me <S%H3966>sore<s%>: therefore I cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> all the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> out <S%H2351>of<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>commanded<s%>, and they <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>: and thither brought I <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, with the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> and the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>.

¶ And I <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H4521>portions<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> had not been <S%H5414>given<s%> them: for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, were <S%H1272>fled<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Then <S%H7378>contended<s%> I with the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Why is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>? And I gathered them <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> them in their <S%H5977>place<s%>.
Then <S%H935>brought<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1715>corn<s%> and the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil<s%> unto the <S%H214>treasuries<s%>.

And I made <S%H686>treasurers<s%> over the <S%H214>treasuries<s%>, <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%>: and next to <S%H3027>them<s%> was <S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>: for they were <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H539>faithful<s%>, and their office was to <S%H2505>distribute<s%> unto their <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God<s%>, concerning this, and wipe not <S%H4229>out<s%> my <S%H2617>good<s%> deeds that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>, and for the <S%H4929>offices<s%> thereof.

¶ In those <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> I in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> some <S%H1869>treading<s%> wine <S%H1660>presses<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, and bringing <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6194>sheaves<s%>, and <S%H6006>lading<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%>; as also <S%H3196>wine<s%>, <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and <S%H8384>figs<s%>, and all manner of <S%H4853>burdens<s%>, which they <S%H935>brought<s%> into <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: and I <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> wherein they <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H6718>victuals<s%>.

There <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> men of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> also therein, which <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H1709%H1709>fish<s%>, and all manner of <S%H4377>ware<s%>, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is this that ye <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>?

<S%H6213>Did<s%> not your <S%H1>fathers<s%> thus, and <S%H935>did<s%> not our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon us, and upon this <S%H5892>city<s%>? yet ye <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H2740>wrath<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>.

And it came to pass, that when the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> began to be <S%H6751>dark<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, I <S%H559>commanded<s%> that the <S%H1817>gates<s%> should be <S%H5462>shut<s%>, and <S%H559>charged<s%> that they should not be <S%H6605>opened<s%> till <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>: and some of my <S%H5288>servants<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> I at the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that there should no <S%H4853>burden<s%> be brought <S%H935>in<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
So the <S%H7402>merchants<s%> and <S%H4376>sellers<s%> of all kind of <S%H4465>ware<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%> or <S%H8147>twice<s%>.

Then I <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Why <S%H3885>lodge<s%> ye <S%H5048>about<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>? if ye do so <S%H8138>again<s%>, I will <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on you. From that <S%H6256>time<s%> forth <S%H935>came<s%> they no more on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>.

And I <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that they should <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> themselves, and that they should <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God<s%>, concerning this also, and <S%H2347>spare<s%> me according to the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>.
¶ In those <S%H3117>days<s%> also <S%H7200>saw<s%> I <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that had <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> of <S%H796>Ashdod<s%>, of <S%H5984>Ammon<s%>, and of <S%H4125>Moab<s%>:

And their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> in the speech of <S%H797>Ashdod<s%>, and <S%H5234>could<s%> not <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the Jews' <S%H3066>language<s%>, but according to the <S%H3956>language<s%> of <S%H5971>each<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with them, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> them, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H582>certain<s%> of them, and plucked off their <S%H4803>hair<s%>, and made them <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%>, saying, Ye shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, nor <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, or for yourselves.

Did not <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> by these things? yet among <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> was there no <S%H4428>king<s%> like him, who was <S%H157>beloved<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: nevertheless even <S%H1571>him<s%> did <S%H5237>outlandish<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> cause to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.

Shall we then <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto you to <S%H6213>do<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, to <S%H4603>transgress<s%> against our <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3427>marrying<s%> <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>?

And one of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3111>Joiada<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, was son in <S%H2860>law<s%> to <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite<s%>: therefore I <S%H1272>chased<s%> him from me.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> them, O my <S%H430>God<s%>, because they have <S%H1352>defiled<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>, and the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>, and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

Thus <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> I them from all <S%H5236>strangers<s%>, and <S%H5975>appointed<s%> the <S%H4931>wards<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H4399>business<s%>;

And for the <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H7133>offering<s%>, at <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H2163>appointed<s%>, and for the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%>. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God<s%>, for <S%H2896>good<s%>.
